output_data.clarification_question: Please specify the total documented time for this established patient encounter (e.g., start time and end time) to determine the appropriate time-based CPT code (90834 vs 90837) or E/M level.

primary_code.rationale: The visit involved significant therapeutic assessment regarding *passive suicidal ideation* and profound depressive symptoms, combined with *Sertraline* medication management (dose increase). This is a comprehensive follow-up session for an established patient. The final code choice depends entirely on the duration of the face-to-face time (90834 if 45-52 minutes; 90837 if 53+ minutes).

output_data.medical_necessity: Management of a recurrent depressive episode (*Major Depressive Disorder, Recurrent, Moderate*) with failure to respond adequately to initial monotherapy, requiring dose titration and risk stratification.
